meta.label: Export nodes
meta.description: Create or update Neo4j nodes from a DSS dataset.

outputRoles.name: output_folder
outputRoles.label: Results Folder
outputRoles.description: Dataiku Folder storing the export log and results

params.name: node_id_column
params.label: Primary key
params.description: In case of duplicates, only one node is kept

params.name: property_names_mapping
params.label: Change names in Neo4j
params.description: Map column names in DSS to property names in Neo4j

params.label: Handling Null Values
params.description: Whether or not to include the default NaN values when parsing the data. Depending on whether na_values is passed in, the behavior is as follows: If keep_default_na is True, and na_values are specified, na_values is appended to the default NaN values used for parsing. If keep_default_na is True, and na_values are not specified, only the default NaN values are used for parsing. If keep_default_na is False, and na_values are specified, only the NaN values specified na_values are used for parsing. If keep_default_na is False, and na_values are not specified, no strings will be parsed as NaN. Note that if na_filter is passed in as False, the keep_default_na and na_values parameters will be ignored.

params.name: na_values
params.label: Custom Null Values
params.description: List of string values to read as null before sending to Neo4j

params.name: keep_default_na
params.label: Keep Default null Values
params.description: By default the following values are interpreted as NaN: ‘’, ‘#N/A’, ‘#N/A N/A’, ‘#NA’, ‘-1.#IND’, ‘-1.#QNAN’, ‘-NaN’, ‘-nan’, ‘1.#IND’, ‘1.#QNAN’, ‘<NA>’, ‘N/A’, ‘NA’, ‘NULL’, ‘NaN’, ‘None’, ‘n/a’, ‘nan’, ‘null’

params.name: batch_size
params.label: Batch size
params.description: Number of rows in each Cypher query commit.

params.name: load_from_csv
params.label: Import data from CSV files
params.description: Requires output folder to be in a connection pointing to the Neo4j import directory.

params.name: csv_size
params.label: CSV file size
params.description: Number of rows to send by batch as CSV files to the Neo4j import directory.

params.name: clear_before_run
params.label: Delete nodes before run
params.description: Nodes with this label will be deleted before run
